Replies.Reply: I'd never given much thought to how I would die..
But dying in the place of someone I love seems like a good way to go..
... So I can't bring myself to regret the decision that brought me here to die...
... The decision to leave home.
Have a good..
... life.   Clearly, not close friends. Bella's grown-up demeanor and innate intelligence become apparent as -
Look. You also called Mexico.
Very romantic.
I won't change my mind, mom.
Mom, I want to go. I'll be fine.
That's right. One bathroom.
I can do it -
Yeah... I think I remember..
No way. The truck is for me?
It's perfect!
Maybe I can give you a ride to school.
Too bad. Would've been nice to know at least one person.   As she starts up the truck we MATCH CUT -
I -- no, I'm not news -- I'm, seriously, not at all -
Would you mind just pointing me toward Mr. Varner's class?
Are you alright? I warned them not to make me play.
That's why they kicked me out.
Sorry. There's always eating disorders, or Speedo padding on the swim team -
Who are they?
Who's he?
I wasn't planning on it.
Jerk.
That'd be great, thank you.
So... you eat here every night?
I can cook.
I do the cooking at home - in Phoenix. Mom's not great in the kitchen.
A few people... Do you know the Cullen family?
No... well, a little.
... Okay.
Mom, where's your cell?
They've all been really..
Dad, I'm heading out.
Dad, I can drive myself to school.
Ice doesn't help the uncoordinated.
You got me new tires. No one's ever done that before.
I mean... nothing.
An animal?
Be careful.
And thank you. For the tires.

Terrific.   She heads toward her seat, brushing off her hair. But she freezes when she sees --Edward.   Bella straightens, girding herself. Then strides to the table, and confidently drops her books down, ready to address him. But he looks up at her -
I'm... yes.   Feeling like an idiot, she quickly sits. He abruptly moves to the extreme edge of his seat. She's even more baffled now.

Onion root tip cells! That's what's on your slides. Separate and label them into the phases of mitosis. The first partners to get it right, win... the golden onion!   He excitedly holds up a spray painted onion. Everyone just looks at him. He's disappointed by their apathy.
You've been gone.
Like I said.
Seriously? You're asking me about the weather?

No. I don't like the cold. Or the wet. Or the gray. Or parkas. Or turtle necks.   Is that a smile playing on his lips? For the first time, he seems more intrigued than agonized. He studies her. She still can't tell if he despises her or not. It's infuriating.
What?
Anaphase.
It's complicated.
Phil is fine. Young for her, but nice enough.
No... I -- I just..
Your eyes were black before, now   they're this golden brown or -
I'm fine, dad. Calm down.
It's okay, Tyler.
Dad, it's not his fault-
But you didn't.
It would have been a lot worse if Edward hadn't knocked me out of the way.
It was amazing he got to me so fast. He was nowhere near me.
You told her?! She's probably freaking.
Can I talk to you for a moment?
You were next to your car, across the lot.
I know what I saw.
You stopped that van. You pushed it away.
I just want to know the truth.
Thank you.
No.
Why did you even bother?
... Yeah, false alarm..
Prom. As in dance. I, uh - have to go   -somewhere. To Jacksonville. Yeah.
Non-refundable ticket. Maybe you should ask Jessica.   Mike follows Bella's eyes way across the lawn to Jessica.
Hello, Edward.
Really?
You haven't answered any of mine. You won't even say hello.
And how did you stop that van?
Floridians. That's what's in Jacksonville.
No way. Zero weirdness. You guys are great together.
You could have let the van crush me and saved yourself all this regret.
I know you do.
Your fault, for telling her about the accident.
He is.
Should I know what that means?
Thanks... but your mood swings are giving me whiplash.
What does that even mean?
spiders? Kryptonite?
No. I don't believe that. You're not bad. You can be a jerk, but it's like this... mask. To keep people away.   He's taken aback by her honesty, her insight, drawn in by her..
Look, why don't we just - hang out. Like... come to the beach with us. It'll be fun - sand fleas, wind burn, salt water stinging your eyes..
Is something wrong with that beach?
Take control. You're a strong independent woman.
Guys, this is Jacob. Are you stalking me?
To be polite.
You know them?
You want to go look at tide pools?
So, what did your friend mean about the Cullens not coming here?
I can keep a secret..
Like fur, fangs ... doggy breath?
So the legend about the Cullens is..
Didn't they just move here?
Riiiight. So what was this treaty?
They just... ditch?
It's a family thing.
Port Angeles?..
Maybe I should just go check out the   book store and meet you at the   restaurant later.
Look, just take my bag.
What -- no, how did you find -- ?
And you do?
Okay, well. Thank you.
I could eat.
You're not eating?
Like South Beach?
I didn't ask for the square root of pi.
Were you following me?
So that's a yes?
You said before... That you heard what those guys were thinking..
Alright, so you read minds... What am I thinking? Wait -- okay now, go.
Why, what's wrong with me?
What is it?
Edward, you don't have to.
Edward -
I think I'm warm enough now.   She reaches for the heater dial, he does as well -- their hands TOUCH. And hold a moment too long. An electric current connecting them.
Your hand, it's still freezing cold.
Dad's here late. Something must have happened.
The same kind that killed the security guard down in Mason?
So it's getting closer to town.
But that's -
Bella, you should go inside. Waylon was your father's friend.
Dad, I'm sorry about Waylon.
That's probably not a good -
... it's not possible..

You never eat food, or drink, or come out in the sunlight. And you said no to the beach trip only after you heard where it was. Because of the treaty.   This last registers with him. She steps closer to him.
How old are you?
How long have you been seventeen?
You won't hurt me. You're different.
Where are we going?
No! The sunlight will kill you.
Slow down.
No.
I'm not afraid.
No!
Edward? Where are you?
You're... beautiful..
I don't believe that.
I don't care.
It doesn't matter.
I trust you.
I trust you, Edward. I'm here.
Edward?
Oh... I thought you hated me when we met.
I know you can.
I'm afraid.
Not of that. I'm afraid... you'll disappear. That I'll lose you.
Stupid lamb.
How long have you been like this?
Where'd he find you?
Does someone have to be dying to become like you?..
Show off.
Really? Bet she saw me coming a mile away.
Your house? With your family?
But... what if they don't like me?
I'm glad I amuse you.
What is it?
Come to visit your truck?
A person did that?
It's... wonderful.
No... not moats.
Bon giorno?
Oh, absolutely -
I just assumed -- because you don't eat, you know..
I would never, ever tell anyone.
... Badly?
Oh. Badly. Like, where I become a meal.
And you're Jasper, right?
Graduation caps?
So you're obsessed with music. But..
Ever?
Depends. Alternative? Jazz? Sixties, seventies..
I'd have to say... Debussy.
No dancing.
You don't scare me.
Don't you dare -
Everyone's staring.
Sorry I'm late. Biology project.   Cora sets a top sirloin steak in front of Charlie, and plate of seafood in front of Bella.
Order one for yourself next time. You should cut back on the steak.
He's just a friend.
We're not really going to talk about boys, are we?
I've never minded being alone. Guess I'm a lot like my dad that way.   Charlie smiles. These two have come a long way. Cora returns -
So spring training's going well?
Maybe..
Well... he is kind of a history buff.
I, uh... have to go.
I'll call you later, Mom.   STAY ON BELLA who hangs up.
How did you get in here?
You've been here before?
You're a peeping Tom! Perv!
Oh... I'm... oh.
Wish I could say the same. I'm so embarrassed.
I have a date with Edward Cullen.
it's in the early stage and -
Be nice, okay? He's... important.
Dad.
No fair, reading Charlie's mind.   As they climb in the Jeep, Bella notices a baseball bat -
Now I get why you need the thunder.
That has to be a home run.
Yer out?
What?!? Charlie's there. He's in danger because of me. Because of us!
Get out! It's over.
I have to get out of this place. Out of Forks. I'm leaving. Now.
I can't hurt him.
That's why I have to leave. I don't want this. I want to go home.
She'll come home. I'll call her from the road.
I want to drive. I need time to think. I'll pull into a motel in a few hours. I promise.
Like watch more baseball on the flat   screen? Or go to the Coffee Shop?   Same people, same steak, same berry   cobbler every night? That's you,   Dad. Not me.
And if I don't get out now, I'm   going get stuck here like mom did.
This is insane. You can't put yourselves in danger like this - for me.
If any of you get hurt because of me -
Mom, it's me again. You must have   let your phone die. Anyway, I'm   not in Forks anymore but I'm okay.   I'll explain when you call.
I wish he'd call.
They could get hurt. It's not worth it.
So the course James is on now will lead him to... a ballet studio?
No. I don't know. I used to take ballet lessons as a kid. The school had an arch like that.
Yeah, around the corner from my house. But I haven't been there in ten years.
No. Hell, no. I hated the place.
Edward. Are you alright?
This is my fault. You warned me, but I didn't think. I just..
No... we can't.
When will you get here?
Mom, I'm so glad you got my -
Calm down, Mom. Everything is fine, okay? I'll explain every -
... Mom? Are you there?
Leave my mother out of this.
I... don't think so.
Where should I meet you?
8th and Palo Verde, please.
Everyone makes fun of me.
She's not here.
Edward has nothing to do with this.
No! Edward, don't..
It's on fire! My hand!
It's burning!
Life... is harder..
Edward? Where's -
What... happened?
Sounds like me.
Mom, you're... texting.
That's great mom.
Mom, wait. I want to live in Forks. I have Dad..
What do you think?
Is James - did you -- ?
I'm alive because of you.
Alice lent me the dress. It was the   only thing that would fit over my   cast. Is it too...
Dad.
I can't believe you're making me do   this.
You really are trying to kill me.
You're serious.
At prom.
Edward... why did you save me?
If you'd let the venom spread, I could've been like you by now.
I want you. Always.
Based on what someone decides. And I've decided.
Yes.
Yes.
For now.
No one will surrender tonight. But I won't give in. I know what I want.

-- running for its life as it darts through this maze of a forest. It sprints forward, but we gain on it. Beyond the deer, SEE the forest's edge ahead, white sunlight glowing against the trees. The buck races for the light. We're just behind it, about to emerge from the shadowy darkness -
Now, you know if you change your mind, I'll race back here from wherever the game is.   But Rene's strained expression tells us what a great sacrifice that would be. Bella forces a smile.
Ok, I didn't lose my power cord. It ran away. Screaming. I literally repel technology now.
Now, tell me more about your   school, baby. What are the kids   like? Are there any cute guys?   Are they being nice to you?
Could... a guy have something to do with that?
Tell me everything! Jock? Indie? Bet he's smart. Is he smart?
No way, we gotta talk boys. Are you being safe?
But you're a wonderful dancer.
He's asleep.
Baby, you fell down two flights of stairs and through a window.   Bella is drawing a blank, confused. Rene jogs her memory -

Edward came here to convince you to come back to Forks. His father brought him down. You went to their hotel but you tripped on the stairs. A moment... then Bella realizes it's a cover story. She nods.
It's Phil. He's worried about you.
Jacksonville is always sunny and you'll have your own bathroom..
And he's there.   Bella shrugs, conceding the truth.
I think that boy is in love with you.
love saying that - on the road.
decided to spend time with my   father.
wanted to ask you - even though it's, like, a month away..

need any of that..
will drive her south.

will go somewhere. Together. The others will keep hunting.
Bella, I swear to you, I'll do whatever it takes to make you safe again.   Off Bella, her eyes welling..
love seems like a good way to go..
want to talk to him. Apologize.
couldn't stop -
don't want -
If you call crappy motels, backwater towns and ballpark hot dogs romantic.
Your hair's longer.
Guess it grew out again.
How's your mom?
I'll just put these up in your room -
So what do you think of your homecoming gift?
Waylon, she hasn't had a Christmas here since she was four.
Easier than washing dishes.
I remember..
How was school? Meet anyone?
Are people talking about them again?
lucky to have a surgeon like Dr. Cullen at our podunk hospital. Lucky his wife wanted to live in a small town. Lucky his kids aren't like a lot of the hell-raisers around here.
You okay, Bells?
That's why I got you new tires. She looks over at the truck -- yep, four new tires.
I'll be late for dinner. I'm heading down to Mason County. A security guard at the Grisham Mill got killed by some kind of animal..
You're not in Phoenix any more, honey. They've been hunting it for a week with no luck. Thought I'd lend a hand.
Always am.
Bells. Are you alright?
It sure as hell is not okay.
We nearly lost you.
You can kiss your license goodbye.
I've got this one, Jackie.
Edward? Your boy?
I just have to sign some paperwork. You better call your mom.
Your mother called. Again.
But... she's changed, too. She seems happy. Phil sounds all right.
Known him going on thirty years.   He's obviously torn up. Bella isn't quite sure what to do.
We'll get to the bottom of this, Bella. But in the meantime..
... I want you to have this.
It'll give me some peace of mind.   She sees he needs this, and allows him to put it into her purse.   As Charlie goes to get his coat, Bella steps outside to SEE -
Pale Ale.
Found a footprint out at the crime scene today. A bare, human footprint.   Billy seems disturbed but not surprised. Bella is horrified.
Guys, we got something -
Ordered you the seafood combo.
I'm healthy as a horse.
The suspect's moving east. Kitsap County Sheriff is taking over from here. They're putting extra guys on.
Your friends are flagging you.
It's okay you wanna join them. I'm just gonna turn in early anyway.
It's a Friday night. Go out. The Newton boy's got a big smile for you. Nice family, the Newtons.
None of the boys in town interest you?
Just... you should be around people. I leave you alone too much.
He's too old for you.
Now? He's out there?
Good.
Bella's going to play baseball?
Well. More power to you, I guess.
You got that pepper spray?
Bells. Did he hurt you?
I thought you liked him?
You can't drive home now. I'll take you to the airport in the morning.
Bells, I know I'm not around much,   but I can change that. We can do   more things together.
Bella... I just got you back.
Heard that before.   Edward moves to open the car door. Charlie holds Bella back.
I put new pepper spray in your bag.
... and... you look beautiful.
Right after I ram you in the ankles.
Actually, we came to visit your flat screen. First Mariners game of the season. Plus Jacob here kept bugging me to see you again.
Harry Clearwater's homemade fish fry.
Any luck with the Waylon case?
Don't want no one else getting hurt.
It's getting worse with old age.
I rebuilt the engine and -
Okay, so you gotta double pump the clutch when you shift, but -
I go to school on the reservation.
You're on my rez, remember? You surfing?
I'm not supposed to say anything.
It's just an old scary story. Did you know the Quileutes are supposedly descended from wolves?
Well, they're supposedly descended from this, like..
Or just moved back.
If they promised to stay off Quileute lands, we wouldn't expose what they really were to the pale-faces..
It's just a story, Bella.
A crazy person, walking around barefoot this time of year.
You're Isabella Swan, the new girl. Hi. I'm Eric. The eyes and ears of this place. Anything you need. Tour guide, lunch date, shoulder to cry on.
Good headline for your feature -
Whoa, chillax. No feature.
You've missed a lot of the semester, but I can hook you up - tutor, cliff notes, medical excuse..
Feature's dead, Angela. Don't bring it up again.
I got your back, baby.
... and yeah, prom committee is a chick thing, but I gotta cover it for the paper anyway, and they need a guy to help choose the music -
La Push, baby. You in?
And I don't just surf the internet.
La Push, baby.
What date?
Gambling, tuxedos and -
Block it, Chloe! Yeah! Good attack!   Unfortunately, the volleyball heads toward Bella. She closes her eyes and flails at it, SMACKING it. It flies off court -
So, you're from Arizona, right? Aren't people supposed to be tan down there?
It's first grade all over again, and you're the shiny new toy.
Because they're all together. Like, together together. The blonde girl, Rosalie, and the big dark-haired guy, Emmett..
... they're a thing. I'm not even sure that's legal.
But they live together. And the little dark haired girl, Alice, she's really weird..
That's Edward Cullen.
Guess who just asked me to prom!
I know, right?
Eric, you stood up once. On a foam board.
out for hiking and camping and   stuff. I tried the idea out on my   parents. Not even close.   Bella registers this as Angela suddenly jumps on them.
I think this halter makes my boobs look big. What do you think, Bella?
Bella?
You said that about the last five dresses.
She was right about this halter,   though. It does look great.
We waited, but we were starving -
I - we - understand. We were just... leaving, so -
Really thoughtful.
Ow!
It's only a flesh wound.
I'm Mike. Newton.
Your home girl?
Come on, Arizona. Give it up for the rain.
Look! You're moving. You're ALIVE!
So what do you think?
You want to go? To prom. With me.
Because Cullen's a freak.
Yo, Arizona. So. You and Cullen.
Sorry, needed a candid for the feature -
-- Wait, that's a good one..
The Cullens.   Jessica leans in, swinging into gossip mode.
They kinda keep to themselves.
Maybe he'll adopt me.
I keep thinking Eric's going to ask me to prom, then he just... doesn't.
I am?
I think it's nice she invited him. No one ever does.
Thank God. We need your opinion.
You're not very good at this, are you?
You sure?
Where were you!? We left you a message.
That's so... thoughtful.
Oh. My. God.
There must be something open sixth   period. Physics? Biochem?
I'll just... endure it.   He strides out the door. Off Bella..
Hello.
I didn't have a chance to introduce myself last week. My name is Edward Cullen.   She's too shocked that he's talking to her to answer.
... You're Bella.
Ladies first.   She grabs the microscope defensively and snaps the first slide in, adjusting the lens. She's curt as she addresses him.
Out of town. For personal reasons.
May I look?
Prophase.
Enjoying the rain?
It appears.
Like I said.
If you hate cold and rain, why move to the wettest place in the continental U.S.
I think I can keep up.
Very complex. So you don't like him.
Why didn't you stay with your mom   and stepdad?
I'm just trying to figure you out.   You're very hard to read.
It's just the fluorescents.
I was standing right next to you.
No, I wasn't.
And what, exactly, was that?
Can't you just thank me and get over it?
You're not going to let it go, are you?
Then I hope you enjoy disappointment.
... I don't know.
What's in Jacksonville?
You didn't answer my question.
Hello.
It helps if you actually watch where you put your feet.
I know I've been rude, but it's for the best.
You think I regret saving you?
You don't know anything.
No. Our bus is full.
Edible art..
It means if you were smart, you'd avoid me.
Probably not. I'd rather hear your theories.
You're talking about superheroes. What if I'm not a hero? What if I'm a bad guy?
Which beach?
It's just a little crowded.
Get in.
I should go back and rip their heads off.
You don't know the vile, repulsive things they were thinking.
Maybe I should make sure Bella gets something to eat.
... If you'd like. Then I could drive you back myself.
I'm on a special diet.
Not exactly.
You knew that?
I didn't.
Don't go.
Yes, I followed you. I tried to keep my distance...until you needed help.
I'm thinking of getting a nine-
Work, sex, money, sex, sex, boyfriend -
I tell you I read minds and you think there's something wrong with you?
I... don't have the strength to stay away from you anymore.   She's surprised. And thrilled.
You're cold. We should go.
That's my father's car. What's he -- ?
Carlisle. What happened?
Waylon lived all the way down on Queets River. 75 miles south.
Seventeen.
... A while.
Say it. Out loud. Say it.
Are you afraid?
Then ask me the most basic question: what do we eat?
You think you know me?
Myth. You need to see the truth.
You should be.
Hold on.
Are you afraid!
This is why we don't show ourselves   in sunlight..
This is what I am.
Beautiful? I'm a killer, Bella. This is the skin of a killer.   His arm juts into A SHAFT OF LIGHT, sparkling again.
As if you could outrun me. As if you could fight me off.
I'm designed to kill.
I've killed people.
I wanted to kill you. I've never wanted a human's blood so much in my life. I'm dangerous to you.
Don't.
I don't know how to... do this.
Me, and my family, we're different from others of our kind. We're not nomadic, we have a permanent home. We only hunt animals. We've learned to control our thirst..
I did. For making me want you so badly. I'm still not sure I can control myself.
I wish I could understand this thing you see in me. You look at me with those eyes..
I can't read your mind. Tell me what you're thinking.
Good.   She sinks down in front of him.
You don't know how long I've looked for you.
Be very still.
And so the lion fell for the lamb.
Sick masochistic lion.
Since nineteen-eighteen. That's when Carlisle found me.   She takes that in, it's a lot. But it stokes her curiosity.
Not just. Our bite contains venom. And once we taste blood, a sort of..
First with me, then with his wife, Esme. He found her in a hospital, as well. The others followed.
Not the only reason.
I don't want to be a monster.

We call ourselves vegetarians, by the way... For our kind, hunting animals is like living on tofu. It keeps you strong but isn't very satisfying.   Then abruptly, he whips past Bella. She turns to see him standing on a large rock in the river.
It's not that impressive, really. Anyone in my family can do this.
Her visions are very subjective. The future can change.
Come to my house tomorrow.   Bella looks up, aiming the hose badly - water ricochets off the cab and sprays in her face. He jumps down from the roof.
A complication.
I'll pick you up tomorrow.
Thanks to tinted windows... It's the one place we never have to hide.
I told them not to do this.
She already ate.
Ignore her. I do.
A private joke. We matriculate a lot.
True, but the younger we start out in a new place, the longer we can stay there.
... and this is my room.
No sleep.
No nightmares, no drool, no snoring.
Do you have any favorites?
Ooh, she knows her music. Alright, nineties. Eighteen-nineties. Classical.
I can always make you.
You really shouldn't have said that.
Trust me?
Then close your eyes.
Open.
Not that guy over -- yeah, he just looked.
The window. As always.
Shh! The Chief will hear you!
I just... like watching over you.   He raises his fingers to her lips, sending a thrill up her spine.
There's something I'd like to try.   She nods, bedazzled by him. He takes her face in his hands, hesitates to test himself, then he softly kisses her..
Don't be. But we have to be careful.
I can never lose control with you. Ever.   She nods, then carefully lies on his chest. He wraps his arms around her. Off the two of them..
Chief Swan. I wanted to formally introduce myself. I'm Edward.
I won't keep Bella out late tonight. We're just going to go play baseball with my family.
Yes, sir, that's the plan.
She'll be safe with me, sir, I promise.
Your father thinks you should go to an all-girl's school.
It's the American pastime. Plus, there's a thunderstorm coming. It's the only time we can play. You'll see why.
Put your hair down -
I shouldn't have brought you here. I'm so sorry.
James is a tracker. I saw his mind. The hunt is his obsession, and my reaction set him off -
I just made this his most exciting game ever.
The first place he'll go is your house. He'll track your scent there.
Then we'll lead the tracker away from him. Somehow.
Bella, don't do this. Just think about it, please -
I'll be in the truck.
He'll forgive you.
Slide over..
It was the only way he'd let you go.   Edward FLOORS it.
Your father's safe now, Bella. The tracker is following us -
It's alright. It's just Emmett. Alice is in the car behind us.   She catches her breath. It kills him to see her so frightened. She looks out the window as they drive through town..
I'll run Bella south, while you lead the tracker away -
Can you keep your thoughts to yourself?
You're my life now.
We lost the tracker. The woman is still in the area. Rosalie and Esme are protecting your father.
Bella, we're in too deep. We can't change how we feel..
I'm strong enough to kill you.
Venom -
No!
It doesn't have to be that way.
What's the other choice? You said -
Tighter, above the knee -
Carlisle.
I -- won't be able to stop -
It's alright, Bella. I'll make it go away.   He looks at her - then starts to suck the venom from her hand. They never take their eyes off one another, the connection palpable, intense..
We took care of him. And the woman, Victoria, she ran off.
You're in here because of me.   Her wounds cause him pain. He strokes her face.
Bella, you should go to Jacksonville. Where I can't hurt you anymore..
Sssh. It's alright. I'm not going anywhere. I'm right here..
Prom is an important rite of passage. I don't want you to miss anything.   She can't be mad at him, just shakes her head affectionately.
See? You're dancing.
You don't know what you're saying. You don't want this.
I won't end your life for you.   He keeps dancing, slowly, hoping his was the last word.
You really want this?
You're ready right now?
You're going to have a long and happy life with me. Isn't that enough?
HAND grips his shirt, then YANKS him out of the air and out of frame with incredible strength. His guttural SCREAM is choked short as BLOOD SPRAYS THE LANDING..
bearded, hippy logger, WAYLON FORGE, 50, appears behind Cora, leaning over her shoulder to Bella -
vampire. But his eyes, unlike the Cullens, are a deep, sinister BURGUNDY, and absolutely lethal. His catlike movements are always on the edge of a crouch.
solo piano version of CLAIR DE LUNE begins to play.
ballet bar wraps around the walls -
rag, a shirt.
